original: zhes pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ste /

original: bla na med par gsungs pa'i don te /
analyzed: bla na med par gsungs pa'i don te /

original: mos pa sna tshogs pa'i sems can gyi bsam pas phye ba lus rtag par lta ba las yang dag par sbyar ba'i chos kyi phung po brgyang khri bzhi stong bstan pa de las 'di mchog gi phyir na phyi ma ste /

translated: The Dharma piá¹­aka of forty-four thousand dharmas is taught for the sake of sentient beings with various inclinations, who are divided by their views, such as the view of the permanence of the body. Since this is the best of those, it is the next, the next.

original: bla na med pa de kho na nyid rtogs pa'i thugs so //
analyzed: bla na med pa de kho na nyid rtogs pa'i thugs so //
translated: It is the mind that realizes the unsurpassed reality.

original: de'ang sangs rgyas thams cad dang bcas pa'i rdo rje so so rang gis rig pa'i rang bzhin tshig gi lam gyis de dag 'dzin to //
analyzed: de'ang sangs rgyas thams cad dang bcas pa'i rdo rje so so rang gis rig pa'i rang bzhin tshig gi lam gyis de dag 'dzin to //
translated: Moreover, the nature of the individual self-awareness of the vajra of all the buddhas is apprehended by the path of words.

original: de'i phyir na de nyid dman pa pa ni bskal pa bye ba brgya kyang mi 'grub po zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir na de nyid dman pa pa ni bskal pa bye ba brgya kyang mi 'grub po zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so //

original: mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba sdom //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba sdom //

original: zhes pas ni 'khor phun sum tshogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes pas ni 'khor phun sum tshogs pa gsungs te /

original: mkha' 'gro ma ni de be ha ya sa g'a ma ne zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma ni de be ha ya sa g'a ma ne zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Dakini means she who moves in space (khecarÄ«).

analyzed: de zhes pa ni nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i don du ston te / ae dang phral nas a'a dang sbyar bar d'a nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: The word khe is taught to mean moving in space.ğŸ”½ Separated from e, when joined with a, it becomes da.

original: d'ar gyur pas d'a nam zhes bya bar lugs kyis 'gyur te /
analyzed: d'ar gyur pas d'a nam zhes bya bar lugs kyis 'gyur te /

original: d'a nam gi don ni nam mkha' 'gro ba'i don to //
analyzed: d'a nam gi don ni nam mkha' 'gro ba'i don to //

original: d'a zhes bya ba'i sgra 'ba' zhig ni gsum pa ste des mthar chags su 'gro ba ni aa ka'o //
analyzed: d'a zhes bya ba'i sgra 'ba' zhig ni gsum pa ste des mthar chags su 'gro ba ni aa ka'o //
translated: The word da alone is the third case, and by that, the continuative is a.

original: 'di la thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba ni mthar chags kyi sa 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: 'di la thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba ni mthar chags kyi sa 'gro ba'o //

original: aa ki tu zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: aa ki tu zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Akitu means in the sky.

original: 'di'i ngang tshul mkha' la 'gro bas 'di dag mkha' 'gro ma ste /
analyzed: 'di'i ngang tshul mkha' la 'gro bas 'di dag mkha' 'gro ma ste /

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi sku bye ba khri phrag brgyad stong du ldan pa'i cig car thams cad du 'gro'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi sku bye ba khri phrag brgyad stong du ldan pa'i cig car thams cad du 'gro'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that they all go everywhere simultaneously with a magical body of eight thousand trillion.

original: dra ba ni de'i dra ba ste /
analyzed: dra ba ni de'i dra ba ste /
translated: Jala means its net,

original: bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: meaning its collection.

original: sdom pa ni bde mchog go //
analyzed: sdom pa ni bde mchog go //

analyzed: de rnams kyi lhan cig tu skad cig skad cig yang dag par mnyes par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are to be delighted in every moment together with those.

original: gsang ba zhes pa la sogs pas ni stong pa'i bdag nyid yi ge bcu drug po de dag thams cad kyi sgras bstan par bya ste /
analyzed: gsang ba zhes pa la sogs pas ni stong pa'i bdag nyid yi ge bcu drug po de dag thams cad kyi sgras bstan par bya ste /
translated: The secret and so forth are all the sixteen vowels that are the nature of emptiness.

original: ra ni khrag gi khams yin no //ğŸ”½ha ni ri sul zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: ra ni khrag gi khams yin no // ha ni ri sul zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Ra is the blood element.ğŸ”½Ha is the mountain cave,

original: ri sul zhes bya ba mgo bor ro //
analyzed: ri sul zhes bya ba mgo bor ro //

original: s+ye ni dri'i bar bu ste /
analyzed: s+ye ni dri'i bar bu ste /

analyzed: ji ltar lus la dir gnas pa'o //

original: pa ni sprin gyi shugs yin no //
analyzed: pa ni sprin gyi shugs yin no //

analyzed: ra ni de bzhin dri ru gsungs //

analyzed: me ni de bzhin me tog go //

analyzed: ra ni de bzhin lan tshvar ro //
translated: Ra is salt in the same way.

original: @70b me ni de bzhin sha ru gsungs //
analyzed: @70b me ni de bzhin sha ru gsungs //
translated: Me is said to be meat in the same way.

original: sa ni de bzhin sbyor ba nyid //
analyzed: sa ni de bzhin sbyor ba nyid //

analyzed: ra ni de bzhin sen mo'o //
translated: Ra is the nail in the same way.

original: me ni de bzhin rkang du'o //
analyzed: me ni de bzhin rkang du'o //
translated: Me is the foot in the same way.

original: ne ni de bzhin dri yi mar //
analyzed: ne ni de bzhin dri yi mar //
translated: Ne is the oil of smell in the same way.

original: sa ni de bzhin sen mor gnas //
analyzed: sa ni de bzhin sen mor gnas //
translated: Sa is located in the nail in the same way.

original: d'a ni rgya mtshor skyes pa'o //
analyzed: d'a ni rgya mtshor skyes pa'o //
translated: Da is born from the ocean in the same way.

original: sti ni kha ba'i snying po'o //
analyzed: sti ni kha ba'i snying po'o //
translated: Sti is the essence of snow in the same way.

original: tam ni ga pur zhes bya'o //
analyzed: tam ni ga pur zhes bya'o //
translated: Tam is called camphor in the same way.

original: yang na thams cad mkhyen pa kun du 'gro ba phra mo gcig pu ste thugs kyi gsang ba la sogs pa mnyam pa nyid sgyu ma stong pa rang bzhin sems kyi ngo bo de yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che lta bu bsam gyis mi khyab pa
analyzed: yang na thams cad mkhyen pa kun du 'gro ba phra mo gcig pu ste thugs kyi gsang ba la sogs pa mnyam pa nyid sgyu ma stong pa rang bzhin sems kyi ngo bo de yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che lta bu bsam gyis mi khyab pa
translated: Alternatively, the omniscient, all-pervading, subtle, and unique mind is the secret of the mind, and so on.

original: shes rab mchog ces bya bar bshad de gsang ba zhes bya ba de ltar bshad do //
analyzed: shes rab mchog ces bya bar bshad de gsang ba zhes bya ba de ltar bshad do //
translated: The supreme is explained as wisdom, and the secret is explained as such.

original: mchog ces bya ba la /
analyzed: mchog ces bya ba la /
translated: As for supreme,

original: mchog gi don ni de nyid kyi chos kyi skur bshad do //
analyzed: mchog gi don ni de nyid kyi chos kyi skur bshad do //
translated: the meaning of supreme is explained as the dharmakÄya itself.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la rnam par gsal ba ni 'dir dgyes par gsungs so //ğŸ”½brtan pa dang g-yo ba'i dngos po thams cad kyi rang gi ngo bo bsam gyis mi khyab pa lhan cig skyes pa dga' ba sgron ma lta bu de nyid ni thams cad kyi bdag nyid de dbang po thams cad dang rnam par shes pa ni thams cad nas
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la rnam par gsal ba ni 'dir dgyes par gsungs so // brtan pa dang g-yo ba'i dngos po thams cad kyi rang gi ngo bo bsam gyis mi khyab pa lhan cig skyes pa dga' ba sgron ma lta bu de nyid ni thams cad kyi bdag nyid de dbang po thams cad dang rnam par shes pa ni thams cad nas
translated: The illumination of the wisdom of omniscience is said here to be delighting.

original: thams cad du sems te yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'di nyid du gsungs te /
analyzed: thams cad du sems te yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'di nyid du gsungs te /
translated: The inconceivable intrinsic nature of all things, both animate and inanimate, is the lamp-like connate joy itself, which is the nature of all, and all the faculties and consciousnesses are all the mind, which is said to be this very mental consciousness.

original: shes rab dang rtog pa dang blo zhes bshad do //
analyzed: shes rab dang rtog pa dang blo zhes bshad do //
translated: Wisdom, thought, and understanding are explained.

original: rtag pa zhes pa ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang de ltar gyi dus kyi bdag nyid can gyi mchog ste /
analyzed: rtag pa zhes pa ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang de ltar gyi dus kyi bdag nyid can gyi mchog ste /
translated: The permanent is the supreme, which is the nature of the past, future, and present.

original: de yang skye zhing 'jig pa dang / bral ba dang khyab pa nyid dang sku rdo rje nyid dang rnam pa med pa nyid dang rtag tu gsal bar skye ba nyid dang dus thams cad pa nyid do zhes gsungs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de yang skye zhing 'jig pa dang / bral ba dang khyab pa nyid dang sku rdo rje nyid dang rnam pa med pa nyid dang rtag tu gsal bar skye ba nyid dang dus thams cad pa nyid do zhes gsungs par 'gyur ro //
translated: Moreover, it is said to be unborn and unceasing, free from origination and destruction, free from separation and pervasion, the very nature of the vajra body, devoid of aspects, always arising as clear light, and present at all times.

original: bzhugs zhes pa ni dngos po thams cad dang sems can thams cad kyi khams thams cad la dus thams cad du lus thams cad la sems kyi rgyun gyis mnyam par khyab par bzhugs pa ste /

analyzed: lo grangs nyi shu lnga pa ni dbang bskur ba'i don ji srid pa ste me long lta bu la sogs pa ye shes lnga rnam par dag pa go rims bzhin du blta'o zhes pa'o //
translated: The twenty-five-year-old girl is the consecration, and the five intuitions such as the mirror-like are purified in sequence.

original: dbugs 'byin pas zhes pa ni rang gi lhag pa'i lha la rab tu phyogs pas so //
analyzed: dbugs 'byin pas zhes pa ni rang gi lhag pa'i lha la rab tu phyogs pas so //
translated: The exhalation is the direction of one's own special deity.

original: rab tu sbyangs pa'i btsun mo spyod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa dang bcas pa ni rigs ldan ma ste rigs kyi bu mo'o //
analyzed: rab tu sbyangs pa'i btsun mo spyod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa dang bcas pa ni rigs ldan ma ste rigs kyi bu mo'o //
translated: The â€œnoble maidenâ€ is the queen who is well trained and who follows the conduct.

original: gzhan byang chub kyi sems bskyed pas 'dus byas pa dag kyang yang dag par gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan byang chub kyi sems bskyed pas 'dus byas pa dag kyang yang dag par gzung bar bya'o //
translated: And the others who have generated the Thought of Awakening should be properly supported.

original: dri'i zhes pa ni me tog sna tshogs pa la sogs pa dang ras dang rgyan la sogs pas rnam par brgyan par bya'o //
analyzed: dri'i zhes pa ni me tog sna tshogs pa la sogs pa dang ras dang rgyan la sogs pas rnam par brgyan par bya'o //
translated: â€œWith perfumeâ€ means with various flowers, etc., and with cloth, ornaments, etc.

original: chu dang bcas zhes bya ba ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i chad du shes par bya ste /
analyzed: chu dang bcas zhes bya ba ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i chad du shes par bya ste /
translated: â€œWith waterâ€ means that the various kinds of water should be known.

original: rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan skye ba rnams kyi rim pa bzhin du phan pa'i phyir na bstan zhes pa'o //
analyzed: rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan skye ba rnams kyi rim pa bzhin du phan pa'i phyir na bstan zhes pa'o //
translated: Because they are beneficial in the order of the arising of wind, bile, and phlegm, they are taught.

original: de dag sbyin zhing yang dag par mchod na mchod pa'i bdag nyid du 'gyur te /
analyzed: de dag sbyin zhing yang dag par mchod na mchod pa'i bdag nyid du 'gyur te /
translated: When they are given and properly worshipped, one becomes the very embodiment of worship.

original: bdag nyid sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ngo bo mchog tu dga' ba'i sku phyogs bcur gsal ba ye shes snang ba'i sgron mas mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pas so //

analyzed: ni zhes pa'i sgra ni nges par shes par bya ba'i don du blta'o //

original: rta mchog dpal ni so ga'o //

original: char dus de bzhin he ru ka //

analyzed: de bzhin chu ni char pa'i dus //

original: ston gyi dus ni mar khu'o //
analyzed: ston gyi dus ni mar khu'o //

original: kye / dgun stod de bzhin me tog go //
analyzed: kye / dgun stod de bzhin me tog go //

original: dgun smad dus ni ga pur gyi'o //
analyzed: dgun smad dus ni ga pur gyi'o //

original: de bzhin bzhi cha mnyam par dpyid //
analyzed: de bzhin bzhi cha mnyam par dpyid //

original: ces so // de rnams ni rnal 'byor pa'i sman chen po ste dus tshod drug tu yongs su shes par bya'o //
analyzed: ces so // de rnams ni rnal 'byor pa'i sman chen po ste dus tshod drug tu yongs su shes par bya'o //

analyzed: 'di 'dra ba'i dus kyi mchod pa ni mi mnyam ste rnal 'byor pa thams cad la dam pa'o //

original: de lta bu'i rang gi ngo bo rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i rnal 'byor pa la rdo rje rnal 'byor ma thams cad dang / rnal 'byor pa dang mkha' 'gro ma rnams mnyes nas kun nas 'du'o //

analyzed: pho nya zhes pa ni de ltar mchod pas pho nya rnams nges par mnyes par 'gyur te /

analyzed: mchog dang 'bring dang zhes pa la sogs pa sngon du gsungs so //
translated: The supreme, the middling, and so on, were previously mentioned.

original: de yis gang bskyed pa dang bcas pa de /
analyzed: de yis gang bskyed pa dang bcas pa de /
translated: That which is generated by that, along with that,

original: yid ni nang du chud pa yis //
analyzed: yid ni nang du chud pa yis //
translated: is the mind that is inwardly absorbed.

original: zhes pa ni bsgom par bya ba ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ni bsgom par bya ba ste /

original: rang rdzas zhes pa ni ga pur ro //

analyzed: mchod par bya zhes pa la sogs pa ni don ji lta ba nyid do //

original: sbrang rtsi ni mar chen po'o //
analyzed: sbrang rtsi ni mar chen po'o //

original: khrag ces pa ni me tog go //
analyzed: khrag ces pa ni me tog go //

analyzed: ga pur bcas zhes pa ni ga pur dang lhan cig bsres pa 'di ni me tog ste /

original: rim par dbye ba med pas so //
analyzed: rim par dbye ba med pas so //

analyzed: dmar dang tsandan ni sha'o //

analyzed: sbyar ba dag ces pa ni bshad pa la sogs pa dang lhan cig par bdud rtsi ro mchog drug pa dpag tu med pa'o //

analyzed: rdo rje mtshan ma zhes pa ni chos 'byung bar gzhag pa'o //

analyzed: de nas thams cad rdo rje ni bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka'o //
translated: Then, all vajras are the glorious BhagavÄn Heruka.

analyzed: de'i mtshan ma ni mtshan ma thob pa ste de la rang gi lag pas blangs te myong ba'o //

analyzed: srin lag ni sa'o //
translated: The ring finger is the earth.

original: mthe bong ni ri rab tu sbyar te dkrugs la rang byung gi byang chub rnam pa gsum gyis shes par bya'o //
analyzed: mthe bong ni ri rab tu sbyar te dkrugs la rang byung gi byang chub rnam pa gsum gyis shes par bya'o //

original: 'o ma dang chu dang bdud rtsi lta bur ro //
analyzed: 'o ma dang chu dang bdud rtsi lta bur ro //
translated: Like milk, water, and nectar.

original: de yang aom ha ho: hr'i: zhes pa ste yi ge has ni kha dog 'joms /
analyzed: de yang aom ha ho: hr'i: zhes pa ste yi ge has ni kha dog 'joms /
translated: Moreover, it is Om, ha, ho, hrih, where the syllable ha destroys color.

original: yi ge ho: sa ni dri nyid sel //
analyzed: yi ge ho: sa ni dri nyid sel //

original: yi ge hr'i: sa ni 'bar bar sbar //
analyzed: yi ge hr'i: sa ni 'bar bar sbar //

original: dag byed rab tu 'tshed pa'o //ğŸ”½blo dang ldan pas de lta bu'i //
analyzed: dag byed rab tu 'tshed pa'o // blo dang ldan pas de lta bu'i //
translated: The purifier is the one who burns.ğŸ”½The wise one, by the cause of tasting

original: bdud rtsi myangs pa'i rgyus 'grub po //
analyzed: bdud rtsi myangs pa'i rgyus 'grub po //
translated: such nectar, becomes accomplished.

original: de yang dang por bla ma la 'bul lo //
analyzed: de yang dang por bla ma la 'bul lo //

analyzed: de yang bdud rtsi lnga'i snying po yang dag par sbyar ba 'di spyod pa ni rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid lta bur blta'o //

analyzed: yang na ga pur bcas zhes pa ni byang chub sems dang bcas pa'o //
translated: Alternatively, together with camphor means together with bodhicitta.

analyzed: tshogs dbus su ni rab gzhag la //

analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa la /

analyzed: thabs nyid gang zhe na /
translated: What is the method?

analyzed: srin lag mthe bong dag kha sbyar //

analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te srin lag ni padma'o //

analyzed: de lta bu'i sbom po dang tha ltag sprad pa dag rang rig tu bldag cing myang ngo zhes pa'i don to //

original: mchod bzhi de bzhin @74a * //
analyzed: mchod bzhi de bzhin @74a * //
translated: The four offerings are likewise

original: rnal 'byor rnams //
analyzed: rnal 'byor rnams //

analyzed: zhes pa ni 'di lta ste /

analyzed: rdo rje'i grva bzhir 'di dag ste /

original: bzhi pa yig 'bru dgod pa'o //
analyzed: bzhi pa yig 'bru dgod pa'o //

original: zhes gsungs pas na //

original: de bzhin rnal 'byor ma zhes pa ni phyogs bzhi'i mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa ste de rnams kyis dkyil 'khor lo'i bdag nyid la mchod par byed do zhes pa'i don to //

translated: In all the buddha-fields, all the Tathagatas and all the dharmas are not imagined and are non-conceptual, yet they are fully known as they are. This is the meaning of â€œgrasping thatness.â€

analyzed: ro'i rgya skyegs kyi khu ba dang tsandan dmar po bsregs pas bri bar bya'o //

original: mchog tu mnyam pa'i ma mo'i khyim du 'jam zhing 'bol ba'i stan la lha'i rnal 'byor du dmigs te 'dug la de nas skye gnas kyi phyag rgya bcings la bsgrub bya la mngon du phyogs te gsangs sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so //
analyzed: mchog tu mnyam pa'i ma mo'i khyim du 'jam zhing 'bol ba'i stan la lha'i rnal 'byor du dmigs te 'dug la de nas skye gnas kyi phyag rgya bcings la bsgrub bya la mngon du phyogs te gsangs sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so //
translated: In a house of a woman who is a friend, on a soft and thick seat, one should sit visualizing the yoga of the deity. Then, having formed the mudra of the womb, facing the victim, one should recite the mantra one hundred and eight times.

original: tsandan dmar po'i rdul las bsgrub par bya ba'i gzugs brnyan byas la de'i lto bar 'khor lo de skud pas bcings te bcug nas bzhag pa'i skud snas nang na mar skye gnas su bton la gzhag go //
analyzed: tsandan dmar po'i rdul las bsgrub par bya ba'i gzugs brnyan byas la de'i lto bar 'khor lo de skud pas bcings te bcug nas bzhag pa'i skud snas nang na mar skye gnas su bton la gzhag go //
translated: Having made an effigy of the victim from red sandalwood powder, one should insert the wheel, bound with thread, into its navel. Having placed it, one should pull out the thread from the womb with the thread that was placed inside.

original: de nas sna'i bu gar yang gdon no //
analyzed: de nas sna'i bu gar yang gdon no //
translated: Then one should insert it into the nose.

original: de nas sbyor ba'i phyag rgya dang ldan par byas pa'i mthe'u chung gnyis kyis skud sna bzung ste bskul lo //
analyzed: de nas sbyor ba'i phyag rgya dang ldan par byas pa'i mthe'u chung gnyis kyis skud sna bzung ste bskul lo //

original: yid brtan pas mthun mtshams gsum du skud pas de ltar snying gar bskul na ni zhag bdun gyis tshangs pa lta bu yang 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yid brtan pas mthun mtshams gsum du skud pas de ltar snying gar bskul na ni zhag bdun gyis tshangs pa lta bu yang 'grub par 'gyur ro //

original: de nas tsha ba gsum gyis bskus te sbra tshil gyis dkris la zangs ma'i khab kyis skye gnas su phug ste /
analyzed: de nas tsha ba gsum gyis bskus te sbra tshil gyis dkris la zangs ma'i khab kyis skye gnas su phug ste /

original: seng ldeng gi mdog med dud pa med pa'i steng du bzlog cing bsro zhing blo dang ldan pas zhag bdun du sngags brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas na ni bsgrub bya nges par dgug par byed do //

translated: One should heat it above a smokeless fire of cutch tree sticks, and the wise one should recite the mantra one hundred and eight times a day for seven days. One will certainly summon the target.

original: de nas mi'i bdag po la sogs pa rnams kyi 'khor dang bcas pa'i ming bris la bsgrub par bya ba'i rkang rjes kyi rdul dang tsandan dmar po'i rdul dag dang / dur khrod kyi gnas kyi thal ba rnams gcig tu byas te /

translated: Then, having written the names of the king and so forth together with their retinue, one should mix the dust from the feet of the target with red sandalwood powder and charnel ground ash.

original: sngags pas lag pa gnyis su bzhag la sngags dang ldan par phur zhing tsher ma can gyi shing gi mdag ma du ba med pa la bsreg par bya'o //

translated: The mantrin should place [the effigy] in his two hands, and, endowed with the mantra, should burn it with smokeless embers of a thorny tree.

original: de'i thal mo ba blangs pa la bsgrub par bya ba'i gzugs brnyan byas la snying gar 'khor lo byas te bcug nas spra tshil gyis g-yogs la bsro bar bya'o //
analyzed: de'i thal mo ba blangs pa la bsgrub par bya ba'i gzugs brnyan byas la snying gar 'khor lo byas te bcug nas spra tshil gyis g-yogs la bsro bar bya'o //
translated: Having taken its ashes, one should make an effigy of the victim, and, having inserted it into the heart of a wheel, one should cover it with lacquer and heat it.

analyzed: de nas ji ltar spra tshil thigs re zhu tsam du zhag bdun du byas na /

original: bsgrub bya de lha'i 'jig rten pa yin yang 'ong na sa la skyes pa lta ci smos te rmongs shing brgyal te gos dang bral bar gyur nas rlung gi shugs kyis 'ong ngo //
analyzed: bsgrub bya de lha'i 'jig rten pa yin yang 'ong na sa la skyes pa lta ci smos te rmongs shing brgyal te gos dang bral bar gyur nas rlung gi shugs kyis 'ong ngo //
translated: Even if the victim is a worldly god, he will come, let alone if he is born on earth. He will come confused, unconscious, and naked, with the speed of the wind.

analyzed: dur khrod dam lam gyi bzhi mdor brkos te bcug na de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du rengs par 'gyur ro //

translated: Whoever does this will be able to remove all weapons merely by seeing them, as if they were a great mass of darkness dispelled by the sun.

translated: Then, having scattered yellow flowers, having pressed down with the left foot, having recited the mantra one hundred and eight times, having dug the ground, having placed it there, having covered it, having made a hut with the name of whomever is mentioned, it is as if impaled on a stake.

translated: Then, having placed a crystal in the mouth of a two-headed snake, he should recite [the mantra] thirty-nine thousand times over the ashes of burnt incense smoke from the sky and self-arisen flowers.

translated: The essence of the juice of the pÄrijÄta tree is as follows: By the method of the past, the pÄrijÄta tree is born from the seed of perfection placed in the mouth of the cow.

analyzed: tshal gyi dbus der dpa' bo thams cad bde ba dga' ba chen por rol pa'o //
